I

icon - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.section302.simulation.Actor
This variable represent the character which represent the actor A for asteroid or S for ship
initializeArray() - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.section302.simulation.SpaceExplorationSimulator
This method sets up for start of simulation, placing the game actors It places 5 ships at the far left in each of the rows in column 0, and one randomized asteroid suing method addAsteroid().
input - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.section302.simulation.SpaceExplorationSimulator
Used to gather user program input.
isEndOfSimulation() - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.section302.simulation.SpaceExplorationSimulator
This method checks the number of ships at start against the number of ships destroyed + number of ships that have escaped for the program to decide whether or not the simulation should end
isMoved - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.section302.simulation.Actor
This variable represents whether or not an actor is moved
isMoved() - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.section302.simulation.Actor
This method verifies whether or not a an actor has moved
isMoveOffBoard(int, int) - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.section302.simulation.SpaceExplorationSimulator
This method checks if a proposed move would be outside the bounds of the 2-D array, if it is outside the bounds it reports true.
